title: Battery Storage Dispatch Optimization
description: An operator needs to create an optimal charge/discharge schedule for a 50 MW / 200 MWh battery system for the next 24 hours to maximize revenue from energy arbitrage.

tasks.description: Get the day-ahead hourly price forecast for the battery's market node.
Retrieve the battery's current state of charge (SoC) and operational constraints (e.g., max charge/discharge rate, round-trip efficiency).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fetches the real-time status and technical limits of the battery.

tasks.description: Generate an optimal hourly dispatch schedule that maximizes arbitrage profit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a schedule detailing when to charge, discharge, or remain idle.
